Package oracle.jdbc.xa.client

Provides classes that implement the JDBC XA APIs.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
OracleXAConnection An XAConnection object provides support for distributed transactions.
OracleXADataSource A factory for XAConnection objects.
OracleXAHeteroCloseCallback This class implements the OracleCloseCallback interface that is defined in oracle.jdbc.driver.
OracleXAHeteroConnection A factory for Connection objects.
OracleXAHeteroResource Implements javax.transaction.xa.XAResource.
OracleXAResource Implements javax.transaction.xa.XAResource.

 

Package oracle.jdbc.xa.client Description

Provides classes that implement the JDBC XA APIs. These should be used outside the Oracle RDBMS.
